Class AbstractJspPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openxava.web.layout.AbstractBasePainter
      • org.openxava.web.layout.AbstractJspPainter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ILayoutPainter

    public abstract class AbstractJspPainter
extends AbstractBasePainter
    Base painter for JSP type painters.
